about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Senior Full-Stack Developer, Mobile Engineer, and AI Software Engineer based in Brazil with over 10 years of experience designing and building scalable, high-performance web and mobile applications. Skilled in React, Vue, Node.js, Laravel, Python, React Native, Flutter, and cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes). I deliver fast, reliable, and user-focused solutions for startups, agencies, and international clients with strong expertise in system architecture, automation, and AI-powered features.
